Plot: High school girl and four other people were forced to play a X-game to take responsibility for what they did in the past.
Title: X Game 2
Writer: Yûsuke Yamada (based on the novel by), Bobby White (subtitles), Yoshimasa Akamatsu (screenplay)
Actors: Aika Ohta, Natsumi Hirajima, Hirofumi Araki, Mayumi Asaka
